summary: The Defense Commissary Agency operates 236 commissaries worldwide to provide reduced-price groceries as a benefit to eligible customers, including service members, their families, and veterans. The agency strives to give customers a 23.7% discount, on average, over other stores. It also seeks to reduce its reliance on appropriations, which are about a billion dollars annually. It has not demonstrated that it met either of these...
title: Defense Commissaries: Actions Needed to Clarify Priorities and Improve Program Management
